mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, s.*, ls.no lsno, ls.daycode, ls.roomcode, ls.timecode, ls.sbjno, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lectureapply WHERE sbjno = s.no) AS student_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lectureqna WHERE sbjno = s.no) AS qna_count FROM subject s JOIN lectureschedule ls ON ls.sbjno = s.no ORDER BY S.no ASC ) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum}-1)*#{size} AND #{pageNum}*#{size}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, s.*, ls.no lsno, ls.daycode, ls.roomcode, ls.timecode, ls.sbjno, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lectureapply WHERE sbjno = s.no) AS student_count, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM lectureqna WHERE sbjno = s.no) AS qna_count FROM subject s JOIN lectureschedule ls ON ls.sbjno = s.no WHERE s.pfno = #{prof.no} ORDER BY S.no ASC ) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum}-1)*#{size} AND #{pageNum}*#{size}
